title: Is it Possible to be unbaned from Perma ban ?
body:
Hello,


Soooooooo where do i start.....

Well lets be blunt: Iam a pretty toxic player if one of my teammates does something stupid or anything like that. That got me Chatbaned often too. But since iam also very dumb i couldnt stop being toxic. This led to a 2 Week ban, in which was very deserved, since i was toxic in 3 games or more. I was playing normal and friendly and all for some good amount of time(If i do say so myself). I even unlocked honor again. I was happy. 

Noooowwwwwww theres the problem again. I was playing ranked with some friend of mine and we played pretty well. Until late game the whole team, but one player, played well and we all were friendly. It would be great if it wouldnt be for that one player.... Since like 20 Minutes ingame he spammed Surrender vote eventho we were ahead and had that easy. Ofcourse that tilted me hard and i didnt want to mtue him cuz he made some decent calls. Later ingame he just flamed the whole team, me especially, because i wasnt able to kill their jhin once. He kept on blaming the whole team and then i lost it. I told him to stfu and that hes the worst player in this team, i just couldnt help it. That was one out of 2 Games that showed up with the Message "Permanently 
banned".  


Thats pretty sad to read because i wasted much money on my account. 

Anyway i just wanted to ask if Riot unbans Permanently banned accounts

Thanks in Advance

Pink Wards Clone

replies.body: As WhyEvenBotherFR said, no, Riot doesn't unban accounts that have been permanently banned. The 14-day ban was your last warning, and you were on thin ice for a good while afterwards. Ignoring that warning - by accident or by intent - tells Riot that you couldn't reform.

Sadly no. Permaban is permaban. You won't get it back. However I do agree that the system for punishment in place is pathetic. Over half of these kids wouldn't have laste din Xbox Live party with me a long time ago. It's pathetic that the skin of kids these days is so thin. Not only kids but the low 20s. It's ridiculous.
I don't even want to hear someone compare this to Xbox Live stuff. I got temp banned from Xbox Live for having "I'm the mother effin bear jew" as my motto in reference to Inglorious Bastards.
I'm referring to actual voice comms. Not messages. I've said things 100x worse in voice chats for xbox live than this game will ever see and yet not banned there.

Okay, and?

You can probably say similar thing in the voice chat on League. Know why? Because monitoring voice chat with various dialects, and accents is a pain in the ass. It is why voice comms is an opt in feature and not forced.

Why yes it is possible! It is just highly unlikely. Your best bet is to reach out to Riot Support and see what can or can't be done! :)

It's possible to have a permaban removed if it was in error. However, you seem to be fully aware that your ban was deserved. "But I don't like being banned" isn't considered a valid justification for reversing a ban.

riot dont give second chances, however i heard from 2 of my friends they got unbanned after a year or so. it doesn't matter move on to a new game with a better system. riot dont try to understand the situation lead to what happend they only see it from the end result

If you got correctly (according to Riot's logic, which is often pretty alien) punished, they clearly state that it's impossible to remove said punishment.

There were exceptions in the past, like their experiment of unbanning a group of permabanned players to see if they can turn saint. There is no such experiment right now.

Your chance to get unbanned right now is as high as walking out of the building and be able to fly. Your chance to get unbanned in the future is slightly higher.
ok thanks to everyone. Case Closed then i guess ^^
